event_name: 2016 Championship Game of the WSA Future's Cup

players_involved.name: Caroline
players_involved.action: intelligent pressure forces a heavy touch and panicked pass, then combines in a give and go to create a shot

players_involved.name: Sydney Shepelwich
players_involved.action: calm defensive presence, settles the ball and finds a quality pass out to the wing

players_involved.name: Langley
players_involved.action: receives the pass on the wing, combines with Caroline in a give and go to get in behind and create a shot

narrative: Intelligent pressure by {Caroline} in the midfield — great positioning forces a heavy touch and panicked pass. Calm defensive presence by {Sydney Shepelwich} to settle the ball and find a quality pass out to {Langley} on the wing, who combines in a give and go with {Caroline} to get in behind and create a shot blocked last minute by the defender.
caption_hook: Pressure, poise, and a textbook give and go — Coach's gameplan in action!
